text: Indus Kohistani or Maiya is a Dardic language spoken in the Kohistan District and the surrounding regions like Swat District and Hazara. It is spoken by the Kohistani people and is the predominant language of Kohistan. It has two dialects, Kohistan and Kanyawali. It is written in the Nastaliq variant of the Arabic script. ==References== Category:Languages of Khyber Pakhtunkhwa Category:Dardic languages
title: Indus Kohistani
